weka.dl4j.layers

Class BatchNormalization

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.dl4j.layers.Layer<T>
      • weka.dl4j.layers.FeedForwardLayer<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BatchNormalization>
        • weka.dl4j.layers.BatchNormalization
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, weka.core.OptionHandler, ApiWrapper<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BatchNormalization>

    public class BatchNormalization
extends FeedForwardLayer<org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.layers.BatchNormalization>
implements weka.core.OptionHandler, java.io.Serializable
    A version of DeepLearning4j's BatchNormalization layer that implements WEKA option handling.
